# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. The Planning Ministry provides the following "tentative program" for the subject conference.

**APRIL 16 MONDAY**
Arrival and reception of participating delegates.

**APRIL 17 TUESDAY**
Arrival and reception of participants. 0930 to 1800. Registration of delegates in Salon Perez de Holguin (Sheraton).

**APRIL 18 WEDNESDAY**
0930 Session of chiefs of delegation (Executive Salon).
1100 to 1230 Inauguration at technical level of the 18th CEPAL.
1500 to 1800 First plenary session of technical level, Salon Libertad.
2000 Cocktail buffet offered by Planning Minister Gary Prado Salmon, Sheraton, Salon Illimani.

**APRIL 19 THURSDAY**
0930 to 1230 Technical working session, Sheraton.
1530 to 1830 Technical working session, Sheraton.

**APRIL 20 FRIDAY**
0930 to 1230 Technical working session, Sheraton.
1530 to 1830 Technical working session, Sheraton.

**APRIL 21 SATURDAY**
0900 to 1230 In session.
1500 Touristic program - tour of city and Moon Valley, excursion to ruins of Tiwanaco.
1800 Return to hotel.

**APRIL 22 SUNDAY**
Arrival of official delegations. Excursion to Lake Titicaca. Leave 0800, return to hotel at 1600.

**APRIL 23 MONDAY**
0930 Session for chiefs of delegation, Executive Salon, Sheraton.
1100 Inauguration of the ECLA meeting.
1530 to 1830 First ministerial level plenary session, Salon Libertad, Sheraton.
1830 to 1915 Official welcoming of delegations by the Mayor of La Paz, Salon Edilicio, Sheraton.
1930 Reception hosted by ECLA.

**APRIL 24 TUESDAY**
0930 to 1230 Ministerial level session, Sheraton.
1530 to 1830 Ministerial level session, Sheraton.
1845 Official call on Bolivian Foreign Minister Raul Botelho G., Salon of Honor, Foreign Ministry.
1900 Meeting of heads of delegation with President of Bolivia, David Padilla A., Salon of Mirrors, Government Palace.

**APRIL 25 WEDNESDAY**
0930 to 1230 Ministerial level session, Sheraton.
1530 to 1830 Ministerial level session, Sheraton.

**APRIL 26 THURSDAY**
0930 to 1230 Ministerial level session, Sheraton.
1130 Wreath-laying ceremony, Eduardo Albaroa Statue, Plaza Albaroa. (Albaroa was a Bolivian hero in the 1879 War of the Pacific.)
1530 to 1830 Last plenary session and closing ceremony, Sheraton.
2100 Cocktail, dinner, Sheraton.
